ai-patthana22.8:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: allowance (the palace) to the Lord of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.8:0.3_0: Taking a profit, skilled in excess,
ai-patthana22.8:1.1_0: It doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities with senses as its object.
ai-patthana22.8:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
